definitions.body: curse;—abs.´[[ק]]: Ge 27:12 +; cstr. [[קִלְלַת]] Ju Jdg 9:57 +; sf. [[קִלְלָֽתְךָ]] Ge 27:13, [[קִלְלָתוֹ]] 2Sa 16:22 (van d. H. Kt [[קללתי]], so We Dr Löhr); pl. [[קְלָלוֹת]] De 28:15, De 28:45;—curse, Ge 27:12, Ge 27:13(J); oft. opp. [[בְּרָכָה]], De 11:26, De 11:28, De 23:6 = Ne 13:2, + 8 t. Dt., Jos 8:34 (D), Ju Jdg 9:57, Ps 109:17, Ps 109:18, Pr 27:14; [[קִלְלַת חִנׇּם]] Pr 26:2 a groundless curse, cf. 2Sa 16:12; [[קְלָלָה נִמְרֶחֶת]]1Ki 2:8 a grievous curse; = a formula of cursing Je 29:22; = object of curse, [[קִלְלַת אֱלׂהִים תָּלוּי]] De 21:23, [[שַׁמָּה]] [[וּקְלָלָה]] 2Ki 22:19, cf. Je 24:9, Je 25:18 + 6 t. Je, Zec 8:13.
